title: Setup - The Adventure Zone: Steeplechase
description: It’s a new game and a new world. Welcome to Steeplechase, the immersive theme park experience from the Dentonic Company. On the surface, everything is perfect for the guests to live out their fantasies – but that’s only on the surface. Justin GMs his first game, Blades in the Dark (https://bladesinthedark.com/). Meet the new characters and learn the cutthroat rules of the game - and of the park.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Clint McElroy)
